name: Minimal Communication
description:
I am making this for the newbies game jam. Prompt is "minimalism." This is my first game,  constructive criticism is welcome. Only two maps are made for it so far.

Description:
A simple and short RPGMaker game about a man named Knarf chasing down a thief. There will be a handful of puzzles with a focus on humor throughout. I may include some combat in a humorous context.
